title: Pixel 4a dropped briefly in water. Now ringtone & notification sound like crackling.
content: After my phone was briefly wet, I  dried it well, let it sit out to dry more.  It seemed  to  work  fine and then began making a crackling sound instead of ringtone or notification tone. Texts and phone calls work.  Music plays.  How can I  get  rid of the crackling  sound?
